thread.title: Illegal Alien Accused of SICK Thing With Beloved Teacher’s Aide… Media SILENT
thread.title_full: Illegal Alien Accused of SICK Thing With Beloved Teacher’s Aide… Media SILENT

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: Illegal Alien Accused of SICK Thing With Beloved Teacher’s Aide… Media SILENT
text:
He not only had a criminal record in Florida and New York, but also had reportedly violated his probation from a 2014 breaking and entering conviction. 
In Massachusetts, he faced additional charges for giving police a false name with regard to drug charges. 
So far, local news station WBZ-TV has been the only media outlet to report on the murder of the 49-year-old teacher’s aide. According to the station, Immigration and Customs Enforcement placed a detainer on Melendez with plans to deport him.   
As far as the mainstream media goes, they have been keeping mum about the murder. 
It’s no surprise either. The crime doesn’t fit the liberal media’s pro-illegal immigrant agenda. In fact, major news networks have consistently criticized President Donald Trump’s efforts to secure the U.S.-Mexico border and keep as many violent criminals out of the country as possible. 
It’s a tragedy that the media will stop at nothing to hold on to their liberal agenda, even if it means ignoring the death of innocent Americans to do so. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter and tell us why you think the main stream media won’t report the crime.
